nodes.text: Islands Outpost was an outpost of the Sith Empire established at the Incorporation Islands of the Coronet City during the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY. During the Kaggath Darth Thanaton removed the commander of the 115th stationed at the Outpost and replaced him with his loyalist Lord Skar.
The Islands Outpost appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on the planet Corellia.
